statements: UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_usage = 150 WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_usage = 200, timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE device_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_usage = energy_usage + 100 WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_usage = energy_usage * 1.1 WHERE device_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE energy_logs l
INNER JOIN energy_devices d ON l.device_id = d.device_id
SET l.energy_consumed = l.energy_consumed * 0.9
WHERE d.device_name = 'Solar Panel';
